  • Constructor Details

    • Towers

      public Towers(float x, float y, float attackRange, float attackDamage, float attackCooldown, String projectileTextureFileName, String towerType)
      Constructor for the Towers class.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the tower.
      y - The y-coordinate of the tower.
      attackRange - The range within which the tower can attack enemies.
      attackDamage - The damage dealt by the tower per attack.
      attackCooldown - The time (in seconds) between attacks.
      projectileTextureFileName - The file name for the projectile texture.
      towerType - The file name for the tower image texture.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(float delta, ArrayList<Enemy> enemies, ArrayList<Projectile> projectiles, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
      Updates the tower's state, including attacking logic.
      Parameters:
      delta - The time elapsed since the last frame.
      enemies - The list of active enemies on the map.
      projectiles - The list of active projectiles on the map (to add new ones).
      batch - The SpriteBatch instance used for rendering (passed to projectiles).

    • renderSprite

      public void renderSprite(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
      Renders the tower's sprite. This method will be called within a SpriteBatch.
      Parameters:
      batch - The SpriteBatch to draw the tower's sprite.

    • getCenter

      public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 getCenter()
      Gets the center position of the tower.
      Returns:
      A Vector2 representing the center of the tower.

    • dispose

      public void dispose()
